Stanza 1:
magarantha podigaLai eduTHu adhil
g m p  m   g m g s   gm mp  pp

manjaL thangam konjam ittu idiTHu

thiru kannam engum suNNam poosi vaNNam seithAnO
g  m  p  S   S n   S  n   p  m  m  md  p  m  g

oru kOdi pookkaL koNdu jOdi pookaL seithAnO

un uthadu sErnthAl poopadayum vArTHai

nam uthadu sErnthAl poopadayum vAzhkai
g   gm  g  m   m    m  p d m   p p

aLLi chErTHE undhan uyirukkuL anumathi oru murai
p n  SRS nSp dp m   nS R  S   nS n p   dp  m g 

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
uchhi vAnai thathi thAvi iluthu
un natchithira thoranagal samaithu
nee muthathAle pandar keela mAlai kolvAya
un muthathil vAnum mannum eeram seivAyo

M:
vAn mazhayil nanainthal payirgal uruvAgum
An mazhayil nanainthal uyirgal uruvAgum
